name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Credit Repair Cloud Automate Letter Printing

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 1 click printing directly from CRC to the post office. For access, please go to the automate my mail website & choose your plan

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate My Mail

Print directly from your CRC Account & Have It Mailed Automatically To The Bureaus.

This extension will not work unless you go to the website and choose your plan to authenticate your account.
